LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_Mana_Desc: The amount of mana a plant can store at maximum.
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFlux_Desc: The daily mana fluctuation of this plant. Mana can be produced by certain arcane plants when fertilized or under suitable conditions, and is not consumed when stored. \nIf the reserve is at maximum, any additional produced mana is transferred to adjacent connected arcane plants.
